channel.title: Removing quest requirements
channel.description: I have this server where you need to complete lunar isle to get vengeance. How can i remove this requirement. Or is there a way i can start each new player with quests complete PLEASE HELP :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: Removing quest requirements
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

In your clicking.java file search for “c.q” I forgot which quest id it is so you might have to look around for hints like maybe there is something that has to do with lunar isle or veng. So let’s say this is your code case 73168: if(c.q10 != 15){ c.sM("You must have completed Lunar Spirit to use this spell."); } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.vengDelay < 30000){ c.sM("You can only cast vengeance spells every 30 seconds."); return; } if(c.playerLevel[6] < 94){ c.sM("You need a magic level of 94 or better to cast this spell."); } if (!c.HasItemAmount(553, 4) || !c.HasItemAmount(560, 2) || !c.HasItemAmount(557, 10)) { c.sM("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if (c.HasItemAmount(553, 4) && c.HasItemAmount(560, 2) && c.HasItemAmount(557, 10) && c.playerLevel[6] > 93 && c.q8 == 15){ c.vengDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.addSkillXP(112, 6); c.specGFX(726); c.setAnimation(4410); c.vengon = true; c.deleteItem(553, 4); c.deleteItem(560, 2); c.deleteItem(557, 10); c.toX = c.absX; c.toY = c.absY; } break;
Just take out the && c.q8 == 15 and that should be it.

Read full topic

item.title: Removing quest requirements
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

wemissedu:

im using delta, and i have no idea what u mean please clarify

I haven’t a clue how Delta handles it, so I can’t give you exact advice.

However, everytime you interact with anything in-game you’re sending packets to and from the client to the server. These packets are renamed into an easier to read method. So, find out however Delta handles button clicking and add a debug to the console. This will then give you the case ID of the button you’re pushing, which contains the faulty code you want removed. You can also search for the string that’s being sent in order to find this case.

Read full topic

Remove the check when they use the clickingbutton (assuming you’re using PI).
